thread.title: Knife attacker shot outside Iranian ambassador's residence in Vienna

title: Knife attacker shot outside Iranian ambassador's residence in Vienna
text:
VIENNA (Reuters) - Heightened security measures have been ordered at embassies and other diplomatic buildings in Vienna after a soldier stationed outside the residence of the Iranian ambassador to Austria shot dead a man who tried to stab him, police said on Monday.
A member of the Austrian armed forces stands in front of the Iranian ambassador's residence in Vienna, Austria March 12, 2018. REUTERS/Leonhard Foeger The 26-year-old assailant’s motive for the attack, which took place around 11:30 p.m., was unclear and video footage would be reviewed, a police spokesman said.
Slideshow (3 Images) “The attacker stabbed the soldier repeatedly. He was only saved by a stab-proof vest,” the spokesman said, adding that the two men ended up grappling on the ground.
“The soldier defended himself well and was then able to reach for his service weapon and fire shots,” he added.
Reporting by Francois Murphy; Editing by Neil Fullick
